system.description: The creature or object touched becomes invisible, vanishing from sight, even from darkvision. If the recipient is a creature carrying gear, that vanishes too. Items dropped or put down by an invisible creature become visible; items picked up disappear if tucked into the clothing or pouches. The spell ends if the subject attacks any creature. For purposes of this spell, an attack includes any spell targeting a foe or whose area or effect includes a foe. Invisibility can be made permanent (on objects only) with a permanency spell.

components.materialDescription: An eyelash encased in gum arabic (arcane); divine focus (divine)

system.target: You or a creature or object weighing no more than 100 lb./level
system.savingThrow: Will negates (harmless) or Will negates (harmless, object)
